resources:
HEBF Beta
Open navigation drawer Close navigation drawer
Themes Heart empty, battery full "Heart empty, battery full" Google Play Services drain fix Fixes the battery drain caused by some of the Google Play Services background services. Google Play Services drain fix activated Google Play Services drain fix deactivated Zipalign Optimizes the android package files (and its uncompressed data). Zipalign turned on Zipalign turned off TCP tweaks Improves various TCP values for the IPv4 protocol such as timeout and sockets re-use. Internet tweaks enabled Internet tweaks disabled General tweaks Filesystem trim Discards ("trims") unused blocks on a mounted filesystem, reducing the lag. It is recommended that you fstrim at least once in a week. Filesystems trimmed. FSTRIM NOW Performance Tools Battery Main Tweaks Other Share About Faster boot Disable bootanimation Reduces the boot time by disabling the bootanimation (It may seem that your device will not turn on correctly, but it is normal). Sets the shutdown mode to hibernate and enables the Quick Power On feature, speeding up the boot time. Bootanimation disabled, reboot Bootanimation enabled again, reboot Faster boot enabled Faster boot disabled Performance Gaming mode Gaming mode activated Gaming mode deactivated Optimizes the FPS limit, enables purge of assets and frees more RAM for performance improvements in games. Performance tweak Enables the performance tuning mode, decreases the colors number to 16bpp (16 bits per pixel) and optimizes the "fling" velocity (smooth scroll) for a general improvement with minimal impact on battery. Performance tweaks enabled Performance tweaks disabled Best multitasking Multitasking profile enabled Multitasking profile disabled Perfect multitasking. For those who like to use lots of apps at the same time without draining the battery. General performance UI Tweaks Liquid smooth UI Liquid smooth UI enabled Liquid smooth UI disabled Optimizes the touch pressure scale for improved user interface elements. Better scrolling Better scrolling profile enabled Better scrolling profile disabled Improves the scrolling responsiveness and speed. You already are on "Main" You already are on "Performance" You already are on "Battery" You already are on "Tools" Tools Ad Blocker Blocks all the advertisements, including in-app ads. Miscellaneous Rebooter REBOOT RECOVERY BOOTLOADER RESTART SYSTEMUI POWER OFF Battery Calibration Calibrates your battery by erasing the batterystatus.bin file generated by the Android OS containing battery statistics (which sometimes gets corrupted). YOU MUST ONLY CALIBRATE WITH BATTERY LEVEL AT 100%. CALIBRATE NOW ART Fix Gives more free space.
Reboot required. ONLY FOR ANDROID 5.0+ LOLLIPOP Only for Android 5.0+ (SDK21+)! DPI Changer Changes the LCD density. Smaller values are equal to larger screen space. Long click for more information.
WARNING: If CHANGE Value This feature is currently being tested and still has work to be done.
 
 Default DPI for some screen resolutions:
 
 240x320(ldpi) - 120;
 320x480(mdpi) - 160;
 480x854(hdpi) - 240;
 540x960(hdpi as well) - 240;
 720x1280(xhdpi) - 320;
 1080x1920(xxhdpi) - 480
 
 Warning: Please disregard the above information if you are running this application on a Tablet.
This has the potential to cause a bootloop on your device!
If you have set an absurd or inappropriate value for your device it will be passed to the properties file now! was the chosen dpi value, proceed? Your device will be rebooted. CANCEL SET PERMISSIVE SET ENFORCING SELinux Changer Please note that changing SELinux status might not work on some devices or ROMs.
Change anyway? SELinux status changed. A reboot may be necessary. Changes the Security Enhancements status (SELinux). On Android 4.4 and later, the default value is enforcing, unless changed by a custom kernel. Battery Improve Battery Optimizes the Wi-Fi scan interval, enables the power saving mode, disables the error reports without performance impacts to improve your battery life. ONLY FOR ANDROID 4.4 KITKAT … Improve Battery Optimizes the Wi-Fi scan interval, enables the power saving mode, disables the error reports without performance impacts to improve your battery life. ONLY FOR ANDROID 5.0 AND UP Ultra battery saver [UNIVERSAL] Ultra tweaks to save battery on all devices. Noticeable improvement. Ultra battery saver profile activated Ultra battery saver profile deactivated General Wi-Fi Sleeper Increases your battery life by controlling, preventing and scheduling the Wi-Fi to switch itself on/off. Wi-Fi Sleeper enabled Wi-Fi Sleeper disabled Root access is missing, please fix it! Your SystemUi.apk will be restarted and the phone will be locked. Your device will be rebooted into recovery. Your device will be rebooted into bootloader mode. Your device will be shut down. OK System boosted Booster Boosts your device once, drops the caches, frees the RAM. HEBF Optimizer We need to copy some needed files to your device, for that, we need storage permissions (and root access). For security, we will back up some important files. Tap the bottom button to complete the application setup. All set! Backup / Restore RESTORE BACKUP Backup of files has been completed Files has been restored Adblocker activated :) Adblocker deactivated :| Calibrated There was a failure to copy the required files, have you granted ROOT and STORAGE permissions? Welcome! OK CANCEL You should only calibrate the battery with the level at 100%, if the value is different from that, no changes will be made. Miscellaneous Tools Disable logging If you don't want to see the Android striving to record everything that is happening in all applications, enable this option Utilities Hostname Changer Changes the hostname (the device's name when connected to a Wi-Fi or Ethernet network). Hostname Hostname changed Miscellaneous Tools Logging disabled Logging enabled again Touch here for more useful tools Touch here to open the cleaner This application can only work with root access, please, clean the application's data and grant access when the prompt appear. In case your device does not have root access, you can find more relevant information here: 
http://forum.xda-developers.com Critical failure Where is the root access!? This application cannot work at this state, please fix it!
First, clean the application data, then launch HEBF Optimizer again and do not forget to grant root permissions! Not so quick! Give me root access first :) Options Improvements Battery improvements enabled Battery improvements disabled Found Not found! Backup status: Backup date: DELETE Backup Warning! You won't be able to recover this backup, proceed anyway? Backup deleted Cleaner Careful with what you're doing, watch your step man… This can't be undone, proceed anyway? Junk removed Apply at startup Error It seems that busybox was not found anywhere.
This application requires Stericson's busybox to work, please download and install it. PLAY STORE CLOSE GOOGLE This application requires root access which wasn't found.
If you don't know what we are talking about please uninstall this application.
Google has some quick references. About WhatsApp Files Cleaner GOOGLE+ XDA Developer and designer "Fake people have an image to maintain, real people just don't care." The project Empty heart? Thanks Special thanks \@paget96 for the: Learn basic scripting, how to execute scripts, mod building guide, where we took inspiration and some initial knowledge. Thanks, you are somewhere in our empty heart. AdAway open source app, where we took adblocker hosts.
– AdAway is currently maintained by 0-kaladin and Dāvis Mošenkovs. The original author is Dominik Schürmann. We also use some open source scripts made by own paget96 and with contributions from several members of the developer community (check the license in such files). Dominik Schürmann, 0-kaladin and Dāvis Mošenkovs for the: Alpha & Beta Testers ▪ Jamiéric Gomes: Color, Material Design and layout tips
▪ Guilherme Augusto: Color, images and layout suggestions and analysis 
▪ Rivaldo Freitas: Color and layout suggestions
▪ Gominha: Bricks and layout suggestions
▪ Vinícius Nery (VinyX): Colors suggestions, Brasil >>> All

 – Não nos esquecemos de vocês. Important contributions HEBF Optimizer is an application that aims to increase the performance of your device, also by focusing on battery performance, we didn't forget it.
The application also features a useful and intelligent toolbox that you can use whenever you want. …And full battery, in a moment of a loving disillusion, on top of this, my device's battery was discharging fast, so I started working on HEBF with a empty heart and a full battery. 
– Ivsom Emídio The developers Version Changelog: Ivsom Emídio "The blind lead the blind to self-destruction" Initial project, developer Affectionately nicknamed Mitch by the developers, it symbolizes the resurrection of an old version of HEBF Lennoard Silva – Hikigaya Hachiman The mascot Force connection type indicator Attempts to force the connection indicator to show (The 4G/LTE, H+, H, 3G, E or in some unfortunately cases, G icon on statusbar). Requires a AOSP or AOSP based Custom ROM. Hack enabled :v Hack disabled If there are problems even after disabling this tool, try the button below and reboot. FIX OK, reboot Clean hidden thumbnails Clean junk files Thumbnails size: Thumbnails deleted Unknown (Big) (What the… Better clean it!) (What the… Self-destruction risk!) ÿÌùä better üßø?û?üû??ü clean &?üÀú?üUê it! þÿpþþ?ÿPý?üø Could not find one or more files required for application operation. The most common cause is that the application was closed during the first opening or your system uses a different path to "/data".
You can clear the application's data to force the copy again. SETTINGS Thumbnails are taking up too much space miniatures were found and automatically generated by the Android system. CLEAN Enabled Disabled Please allow storage permissions For this function to work smoothly, you need to clear the cache and reboot.
When you press OK the device will reboot. FORCE COPY Force copy HEBF Optimizer needs to copy the required files to the working folder to ensure the new updates will be run. This option attempts to force the copy. Open source licenses Application version Licenses Close Light Recommended All Soft None Profiles Reset Controls Kernel Panic Kernel panic is an action performed when the system detects a fatal software / hardware error from which it can't recover. Disabling it may slightly reduce lags and avoid random reboots. DISABLE Kernel panic disabled Are you absolutely sure you are doing? Settings Internet Tweaks Use Google DNS An public alternative to your current DNS provider. Google DNS (8.8.8.8 and 8.8.4.4) will improve the security and speed up the browsing.
Guess what, it is free. Google DNS enabled Google DNS disabled Improve 3G speed and signal Improves a set of RIL and HSDPA properties, prefix and GPRS classes to improve the quality of the connection. 3G tweaks enabled 3G tweaks disabled Improve browsing speed Tweaks for the buffer size of the connection types, from LTE to GPRS. Results in a better browsing experience. Buffer tweaks disabled Buffer tweaks enabled Improve video streaming Tweaks for the stagefright (the Android media library, not the bug). Results in smoother video streams. Streaming tweaks enabled Streaming tweaks disabled Reduce in-call delay Reduces the delay to receive or end a call. In-call delay reduced In-call delay tweak disabled Rendering tweaks Improve rendering quality Optimizes the screen composition properties and enables overlay UI mode for a better graphics quality. Rendering tweaks enabled Rendering tweaks disabled Use GPU Acceleration Enables the hardware accelerated UI, forces GPU screen composing and disables the vsync for a much better performance at the cost of battery. GPU tweaks enabled GPU tweaks disabled HEBF needs to copy the required files This is necessary to ensure the functioning of the app. <<<<<<< HEAD Application settings Open the Android settings screen for this application. Force stop Kill the application. Manager Low Memory Killer Current: Those applications currently on the screen. Those applications that are running in the background and still doing some actions. Services needed by some applications. The Android keeps them alive in a space in RAM in case they are needed to do something. Processes in idle, inactive but with a reserved space in case it is needed by an alive running application. Those applications that provides the content needed for the Android and the applications to work, i.e the data, refreshing every X minutes. They can manage audio, video, images or personal contact data. The "ghosts", applications that you finished. The Android still keeps them in memory in order to open them again faster. They won't use CPU or drain battery and will get lost if more RAM is needed by another applcation. Provides an option to manually tune your Low Memory Killer (LMK) values. LMK is a set of parameters that sets the limits at which applications are killed in order to free RAM. Set the value to the levels below in megabytes. Current values in pages (1 page = 4KB) SET DEFAULT Medium Aggressive Summary Parameters There are values missing, please check the text fields. Your new values are ======= >>>>>>> origin/master
